hymn.title: Plants, fish, birds, and animals and man
hymn.chords: | C - - - | C - C/E - | F - C/E - | D7 - G - | C - G/B - | Am - C/G - | F - C/E Am | F G7 C - |

layout.singingstanza: Plants, fish, birds, and an -- i -- mals and man, All things cre -- at -- ed by God through His Word. A -- mong all these He made one spe -- cial -- ly, Spe -- cial -- ly to love Him. Now which one could it be?

lyrics.stanza: Plants, fish, birds, and animals and man, All things created by God through His Word. Among all these He made one specially, Specially to love Him. Now which one could it be?
Plants, fish, birds, and animals and man, All things created God through His Word. If you look upon the face of all the land, Only one can love the Lord. The only one is man!
